snippet.title: Noga Trailer - Noga is an action RPG indie game in development.
snippet.description:
Noga my new indie game is an action RPG FPS. Fight drive and craft while unveiling the forces behind an alien attack. 
Check out the Steam store page. https://store.steampowered.com/app/2515490/Noga/
